subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After the Toyota engine failed a postrace inspection, Matt Kenseth was stripped of 50 driver points and the crew chief was suspended, among other penalties.
snippet: After the Toyota engine failed a postrace inspection, Matt Kenseth was stripped of 50 driver points and the crew chief was suspended, among other penalties.
